full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: W6399-22CA50C**
==============================================

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4102449949-Doc4106230724
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4102449949
* **Publication Date**: 19 July 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 31 March 2027, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date**: 23 February 2024

### Request for Tender

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to submit tenders for the procurement of various telecommunications equipment, installation/modification kits, telecommunication services, and data communication equipment or platform rental/leasing services. The tender will be evaluated based on variations or combinations of the specified methods.

### Tender Procedures

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Suppliers must comply with the following trade agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others (Please refer to the attached documentation for the complete list).

### Tender Schedules

* **Contract Start Date**: 31 March 2027
* **Contract End Date**: 31 March 2027

### Tender Status

* **Tender Status**: Open

### Locations

* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Procurement Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Malko-Moore, Shamael
* **Contact Email**: shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documentation

Please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting and the attached documentation for the complete tender specifications and requirements.

Note: The rewritten text maintains the original content and provides a clear and concise overview of the Government tender announcement. I have reorganized the text to make it easier to read and understand, and included subheadings to break up the content. I have also excluded redundant information and ensured that the rewritten text is within the 400-word limit.  Let me know if you need me to make any changes.  Mark.
